Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gloves of Second Sight

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 10.8 million damage and pulsing 534,340 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,210 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cloak of Fel Flames

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
